arguments.value: O1- Owner only function
T1- Recipient can not be the same as sender
T2- Please check the recipient address
T3- The balance of sender is too low
T4- The wallet of sender is frozen
T5- The wallet of recipient is frozen
TF1- Please check the recipient address
TF2- The balance of sender is too low
TF3- The allowance of sender is too low
TF4- The wallet of sender is frozen
TF5- The wallet of recipient is frozen
A1- Reset allowance to 0 first
B1- The balance of burner is too low
V1- Insufficient payment provided
V2- Unverified publisher address
V3- The wallet of publisher is frozen
V4- Invalid hash provided
V5- This hash was previously validated
L1- Please select a valid start
L2- Please select a valid stop
